title: Borina's employee is under arrest for stealing over $30,000 in rabies.
subtitle: :: Rumours: Borina ' s employee was arrested and charged with theft for stealing and eating 30,000-dollar dog biscuits.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A staff member was arrested in Borina and charged with theft for stealing and handling $30,000 worth of dog biscuits.
